catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 766
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small ceramic jar with celadon glaze; two raised bands around top and bottom with shorter raised lines inside bands; three small "feet" near base; ivory cover with two character inscription and incised circles at center
title: Box and assorted implements for the incense game
